actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 to permit an individual to receive a spouse's annuity even though such individual renders compensated service for the outside employer by whom such individual was last employed before the spouse's annuity of such individual began to accrue.

summary.text: Permits, under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937, an individual to receive a spouse's annuity even though such individual renders compensated service for the outside employer by whom such individual was last employed before the spouse's annuity of such individual began to accrue.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 to permit an individual to receive a spouse's annuity even though such individual renders compensated service for the outside employer by whom such individual was last employed before the spouse's annuity of such individual began to accrue.
